\vspace{12pt}

This document introduces **secrpoly** 1.0, an R package for spatially explicit capture--recapture analysis (SECR) when data are collected by search areas or transects. 

The functionality of **secrpoly** is a subset of thatprovided previously in **secr**. 

For background on SECR see the SECR book, [Efford (2025)].  

To be completed...

# References

Efford, M. G. (2011) Estimation of population density by spatially explicit capture--recapture analysis of data from area searches. *Ecology* **92**, 2202--2207.
